name: Peak Performance
description:
Are you ready to reach peak performance?

A physics/idle/building game for LD45. Use the tools given to you in whatever way you can figure out to unlock and build all the things that exist.

Controls

Left click and drag to move most things (including yourself once that is unlocked), right click to interact with things.

To start pick things up manually just by hitting them with the mouse, and placing them with the right mouse button.

To help with testing without the full idle game experience a “fast mode” is available that lets you finish without much need for optimization and grinding.
